questions.question: What is the primary objective of fault finding in a pilot plant?

answers.a: To identify the root cause of a fault
answers.b: To repair or replace faulty equipment

questions.question: Which of the following is a common fault finding technique used in pilot plants?

answers.a: To track and record maintenance activities
answers.b: To assign maintenance tasks to personnel
answers.c: To provide a detailed description of maintenance tasks

questions.question: Which of the following is a benefit of implementing a predictive maintenance strategy in a pilot plant?
What is the term for the process of analyzing equipment condition data to predict potential faults in a pilot plant?

answers.a: To provide a detailed description of maintenance tasks
answers.b: To assign maintenance tasks to personnel
answers.c: To ensure compliance with regulatory requirements

questions.question: Which of the following is a key aspect of a successful maintenance program in a pilot plant?

answers.b: Proper training and development of maintenance personnel
